data.title: Felipe Corcuera Habsburg on LinkedIn: #reckitt #beecker #intelligentautomation #rocket #thetimeisnow #ai #rpa
data.meta_description: Congrats Henrique Lemos, Julio Morales, and the rest of the Reckitt team on a solid event geared towards the use of automation and AI tools to unlock value…
data.text: Robotex is celebrating exceptional milestone in partnership B&R Industrial Automation (A member of the ABB Group) – achievement of “System Integrator” status in Baltics within Value Provider Program. B&R is a leading provider of automation solutions and works closely with sales partners. This worldwide partner program is aimed for the partners that have qualified through their expertise, experience and product portfolio. Value Provider offers services that matter: sales, support, maintenance and engineering of B&R solutions and products. “We're excited to represent Lithuania, Baltics within B&R community as we are passionate about automation. We believe in growing together with B&R and delivering exceptional quality solutions to our customers and ensuring highest customer satisfaction” says Andrius Skuncikas, CEO of Robotex Certified know how from a single source - trained and authorized by B&R. This allows respond more quickly to changes and new requirements in manufacturing or business process challenges ahead. “Robotex team is excited with achieving this special status, as this is the proof of our commitment and top quality engineering of solutions to our customers integrating B&R state-of-the-art products and services, as well getting practical guidance, expert connections, and collaborative problem-solving with global network of B&R specialists and community” says Arvydas Udras, CTO/COO of Robotex „We are happy Robotex to join a global network of automation experts and embark on a journey filled with opportunities. As a B&R Value Provider, Robotex will gain privileged access to cutting-edge automation solutions, a diverse range of products, and exceptional services“ Linas Saikevičius, B&R Sales Manager Baltics “Robotex has earned its place in the B&R Value Provider Program by prioritizing customer needs, showcasing unwavering dedication to advanced technology, and demonstrating exceptional technical expertise. By integrating the latest manufacturing trends into their solutions, Robotex empowers customers to fully harness their machines' capabilities and stay ahead in the evolving landscape of lean manufacturing” Says Josef Necid, B&R Strategy Manager – Eastern Europe. #deltarobots #codianrobotics #integratedrobotics #B&R #ABB #adaptivemanufacturing #ThisIsAutomation #mechatronics #machinevision #robotics #simulation Simas Bikauskas Adas Streleckis Rimantas Slusnys Audrius Pukevičius SBA Group SBA Home
